heading: HB02758
0: AN ACT MANDATING THAT ALL ILLEGAL WOOD PRODUCTS CONFISCATED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL RESOURCES BE DONATED TO THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION TO BE USED FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF CLASSROOM, TABLES, CHAIRS AND OTHER SCHOOL FACILITIES
status: Pending with the Committee on NATURAL RESOURCES since 2019-07-31
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02758
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING THAT ALL ILLEGAL WOOD PRODUCTS CONFISCATED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL RESOURCES BE DONATED TO THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION TO BE USED FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF CLASSROOM, TABLES, CHAIRS AND OTHER SCHOOL FACILITIES
